opqry:info.title: Gliding+Vocalization
opqry:info.opqry:message:
# Gliding and Vocalization
Generate an inventory of `{liquid}` ↔ `[{glide}{vowel}]` alignments found in the selected sessions.
## Output
- *Session*
Session name
- *IPA Target*
IPA Target phone
- *IPA Actual*
IPA Actual phone
- *Total*
Number of occurrences in the session.
## Example:
Session|IPA Target|IPA Actual|Total :---:|:---:|:---:|:---: Catootje.1_10_10|l|j|1 Catootje.1_10_10|l|ŭ|1 Catootje.1_10_10|l|ɔ|1 Catootje.1_10_10|ɹ|ɪ|1 Catootje.1_10_10|ɹ|ɪ̆|1 Catootje.1_10_10|ʀ|w|1
